column3: I have only implemented how a modified version of `wait_for_getheaders` will look like. I had a brief overview of the [get headers](https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Protocol_documentation#getheaders) bitcoin coin protocol documentation. I am trying to understand terms like **block locator**\n\nAre my changes the right way to approach this issue?
Closing the draft. I will send a PR with a better change later!
